mapper.insert: insert into va_plat_virtual_acct ( vir_acct_id,plat_id, vir_acct_type,vir_acct_sort, vir_acct_name,acct_ccy, acct_status,rel_bank_acct, is_in,is_out,is_total_limit, total_limit,is_balance_limit, balance_type,balance_value, open_date,open_user, cancel_date,update_date, source_user,effect_date,plat_name ) values ( #{vir_acct_id},#{plat_id}, #{vir_acct_type},#{vir_acct_sort}, #{vir_acct_name},#{acct_ccy}, #{acct_status},#{rel_bank_acct}, #{is_in},#{is_out},#{is_total_limit}, #{total_limit},#{is_balance_limit}, #{balance_type},#{balance_value}, #{open_date},#{open_user}, #{cancel_date},#{update_date}, #{source_user},#{effect_date},#{plat_name} )
